mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from event where e_date >= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and s_date <= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by e_num desc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from event where e_date < to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') or s_date > to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by e_num desc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select count(*) from event where e_date >= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and s_date <= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) from event where e_date < to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') or s_date > to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
